parameters: (But just to sum up, I should have known these things long ago. I was just too tired last night and accidently forgot a few things)
(所以总的来说就是我昨晚睡懵了，这些事情我本来都应该是知道的)
(Alright, let's go back to my seat)
Ah, Shio, you look tired... Are you not feeling well?
啊，汐，感觉你不太舒服的样子，没事吧？
Hi class president Ceka! No no, don't worry, Something happened last night…
啊西卡班长！没事没事，不用担心，昨晚有些事情…
Hahah, I have heard from WangMilk already. Do you play games at night all the time?
哈哈哈，我都从王缪可那里听说了，你是不是晚上老喜欢熬夜打游戏？
You should really take care of yourself you know
你啊，老是这样，真的要注意身体
It's the School Cultural Festival these couple days, but I saw you hadn't signed up for anything yet. I'm a bit worried about you
这几天是学院祭，我看你还没有报名参加什么活动，但你现在这样的状态我也有点担心你了
Ahh!!! I'm sorry!! I'm fine, I can help…
啊！！对不起！！我没事的，我可以帮忙的…
(I don't know why I didn't sign up for anything)
(我也不知道我为什么没有报名)
(To be honest, I don't even remember I had to sign up for this)
(说到底，我似乎根本都不记得有报名这件事)
(But I should give her whatever excuse I can)
(但现在这种事还是先糊弄过去的好)
(I don't want to let her down…)
Anyhow, don't forget to take care of yourself, and don't do too heavy a workload if you want to help, got it?
哎，总之，你自己看着你的身体，就算要帮忙也别做太重的活，知道吗？
Methods.showTip('Talk to all classmates',`与班级同学交谈<hr>(${$gameVariables.value(2)}/7)`, 3000)
Oh speaking of which, the weather forecast yesterday said the humidity today is only 20%
啊说起来，昨天天气预报说今天湿度只有20%哦
Methods.showTip('Talk to all classmates',`与班级同学交谈<hr>(${$gameVariables.value(2)}/7)`, 3000)
(Ok… Seems that she doesn't feel like talking)
(Maybe she will talk to me if we get to know each other better)
(关系搞好一点或许才有机会搭上讪吧)
Methods.showTip('Talk to all classmates',`与班级同学交谈<hr>(${$gameVariables.value(2)}/7)`, 3000)
Where's the script… Where's the script…Where's the script…
I cannot tell you, that person has been late for 2 months already
我不能告诉你，但是有个人已经拖稿拖了两个月了
Methods.showTip('Talk to all classmates',`与班级同学交谈<hr>(${$gameVariables.value(2)}/7)`, 3000)
My boss at my part-time job asked me to do overtime again…
今天打工的地方又要我加班…
Doing part-time after school is hard isn't it…
上学还要打工真是辛苦呢…
If you muamua me then I will be fine, can you muamua me?
你muamua我我就不辛苦了，能muamua我吗？
Methods.showTip('Talk to all classmates',`与班级同学交谈<hr>(${$gameVariables.value(2)}/7)`, 3000)
If you muamua me then I will be fine, can you muamua me?
你muamua我我就不辛苦了，能muamua我吗？
What is the School Cultural Festival?
You don't even know about the School Cultural Festival?
你竟然连学园祭都不关注吗?
The School Cultural Festival is an annual school wide festival on March in our Yume Sakura highschool. The celebrations will last for two days~
学园祭是我们梦樱高校每年3月份举办，持续两天的全校庆典活动哦~
In the next two days, all classes and clubs will have their booths in the activity square, as to demonstrate their culture
明后两天在学校活动广场上，各个班级和社团都会摆出自己的摊位，以用来展示自己班级或社团的风貌
Clubs' booths will provide all kinds of games and activities, please don't miss them!
同时各个社团还会设计各种各样的游玩项目，届时也请不要错过哦！
Normally speaking, there will be a blackboard design competition. The classes that wish to participate are required to finish a blackboard illustration in their classroom.
一般来说，我们会有以班级为单位的黑板报比赛，具体是要求报名参与的班级在黑板上设计一幅黑板画
The result of the competition will be announced after the third day of stage drama
黑板报的比赛的结果会在第三天舞台剧后公布
还有一件值得提起的事
At the last night, after the end of stage drama, there will be a fireworks show at the playground of school
最后一天晚上，也就是舞台剧结束后，在学校的操场上会举办一场花火大会
I'm not sure when we started this tradition of a fireworks show
虽然不知道是什么时候开始的传统
But it has been a tradition of our Yume Sakura High School for many years already. Our school invests a lot into this activity every single year
但我们梦樱高校每年都要斥巨资举办这场活动
It is said that those who sit together to watch the fireworks on that night will be blessed by the God of Love~
听说在花火大会那天晚上坐在一起的观赏的人会受爱神的眷顾哦~
那有什么我能帮忙的吗
Our class has signed up for the stage drama and also has a booths
我们班有报名了舞台剧而且也有摊位呢
But what should we show on the booths has not been decided yet
不过摊位一直没决定要做什么
Everybody is busy preparing the stage drama
大家都在忙舞台剧的事情呢
Just between you and me, we actually haven't found a heroine yet
悄悄和你说，其实我们到现在都还没找好女主角
How about you having a try?
Then you can only go check how the booths doing now in the square
那你只能去广场看看摊位准备成怎样了
Methods.showTip('Talk to all classmates',`与班级同学交谈<hr>(${$gameVariables.value(2)}/7)`, 3000)
(Why do I feel like a bulletin board)
(为什么我感觉自己像个告示板)
AHHH!!! I'm sorry!!!! Yes what's going on…Wang…WangMilk?
啊啊！不好意思！！啊怎么了…王…王缪可？
(Wait wait wait wait… Why do I know his name)
(等等等等……为什么我会知道他的名字……)
You are a bit weird today… Did anything happen?
你今天很奇怪哦……发生了什么吗？
I stayed up late yesterday, so I'm a bit off today
可能是昨天睡太晚了，今天反应有些迟钝
Shio… why do you never sleep at night, I'm really worried about you…
汐…你老是这样晚上不睡觉，我真的很担心你啊
It is only 9 o'clock but you're already sleepy… What did you do last night? Play Abex alone again?
上午9点你就困了…昨晚又是因为什么，自己一个人打Abex？
Ah, I'm sorry I'm sorry… No, I was playing with…
啊，对不起对不起…没有，我昨晚和…
(It was on the tip of my tongue…)
(明明准备要说出来了，结果又是一片空白…)
Shio, do you know anyone who plays Abex with you?
汐有认识别的人和你一起玩Abex吗？
No no, Ahahah, I'm so sorry, my head feels like a mess now. I played ranked by myself last night…
没有没有，啊哈哈哈，不好意思，我真的脑子有点不清楚了，就我自己一个人打排位而已…
Well, if it was you… I don't think there's anyone who can team up with you. Most of them will just hold you back
也是，汐的话…如果有谁和你一起打Abex，估计也只会拖你的后腿
对啊对啊，啊哈哈，啊哈哈哈
(There was one time I played with one of my friends, but we just kept losing all night)
(上次和朋友一起打了一晚一直在输)
(结果撇开他自己打立刻就赢了)
Oh, Shio, I have a question for you
对了对了，汐，我有个问题想问你来着
So… you know our class has a booth for the School Cultural Festival, right?
等会那个…不是有个咱们班学院祭的摊位嘛…
I heard from Class President Ceka that we haven't finished decorating our booth yet, I don't know if I can ask you to do it with me
我听班长西卡说那个摊位还没有布置好来着，不知道你可不可以和我一起去布置一下
Don't tell me you even forgot about that… The School Cultural Festival Hey!
天哪你不会睡到连这个都忘了吧…就是学院祭啊！
From tomorrow March 4th to March 5th, the largest event once a year at our school
从明天3月4日开始一直持续到3月5日，在我们学校每年一次的最大型的活动
All classes and clubs are required to participate
每个班级和社团都要参与
Our class is going to have a stage play at the gym, and a booth display in the activity square
我们班今年准备搞一个在体育馆的舞台表演，还有一个在活动广场的摊位展示
Yes of course I know, a stage play, a booth, yes…
我当然知道，一个舞台表演，一个摊位，嗯嗯…
Errrrr… You forgot about it, right?… Shio, are you sure you are ok?
额…一看就是忘记了的样子…你真的没事吧汐？
I'm fine, I'm fine, hahaha, don't worry
没事没事，哈哈哈，不要担心
Okay… If you still need to know anything else, you should talk to the others…
行吧…你要是还想知道些什么，就和班里的同学们聊聊吧…
I'm fine I'm fine~ Thank you WangMilk
没有啦没有啦~好谢谢你哦王缪可
(Is it really my first time saying his name? It feels way too familiar…)
(这个好像是第一次说，却又好像无比熟悉的名字…)
(I went to the same elementary school with him)
(And we were in the same class at that time)
(We were not that close at first, but something happened later on, and we got closer)
(虽然最开始没有很熟悉，但后来发生了一些莫名其妙的事情就熟悉起来了)
(Anyhow, we again went to the same middle school)
(总而言之，后来初中也是到了同一所学校)
(Although we were not in the same class, we went home together everyday after school)
(虽然一直没有在一个班里但每天放学还是经常在一起)
(My friends in school were always teasing us, saying that we were a couple)
(初中的时候还被学校的同学开玩笑，说我们两个是啥情侣来着)
(But it's not true. We are just friends, good friends at most)
(完全没有好嘛，他只是我的好朋友而已)
(But then we were again admitted into the same highschool, and we are again assigned to the same class)
(然后结果高中又考到了一所学校，现在还被分到了一个班)
(Fate really likes to play tricks on everybody)
(你说命运这种事，就是很爱捉弄人)
(Always giving you the weirdest script on things you never expect)
(总是在某些莫名其妙的事情上创造些稀奇古怪的剧本)
(Ok, although I'm still not quite sure about my current situtation…)
(Let's talk to my classmates around here and see if I can find out anything)
(但还是和周围的同学聊一聊吧，或许还能知道些什么所以然)
和班里的同学们聊聊吧
Before we talk, can you scold me?
和我说话可以，但你可以先骂骂我吗？
Methods.showTip('Talk to all classmates',`与班级同学交谈<hr>(${$gameVariables.value(2)}/7)`, 3000)
I shall talk to my classmates first
先和班里的同学聊聊吧
I shall talk to my classmates first
先和班里的同学聊聊吧
